extensions.title: Your Extensions

upload.description: Upload your extension package to automatically extract metadata.
upload.dropzone: Drop your .xt file here or click to browse
upload.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please upload a .xt file.
upload.noManifest: No manifest.json found in haextension folder.
upload.invalidManifest: Invalid manifest: missing required fields (name, publicKey, version).
upload.author: Author
upload.versionExists: This version already exists. Please increment the version number in your manifest.

edit.title: Edit Extension
edit.error: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
edit.iconFromBundle: The icon is extracted from your extension bundle.
edit.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete your extension and all its versions.
edit.extensionInfoDescription: These details are read from your extension manifest and cannot be changed here.
edit.marketplaceDescriptionHint: Add a detailed description for the marketplace listing. This is shown on the extension detail page.
edit.descriptionPlaceholder:
Write a detailed description of your extension...

You can use Markdown formatting and embed images.
edit.markdownSupported: Markdown formatting is supported. Click 'Add Image' to upload and embed images.
